title: Variable Data Type Validator
description: Create a program that takes in a variable and its value, then determines and prints out the data type of the variable. The program should be able to handle at least five different data types: integer, float, string, boolean, and list. Use a dictionary to map the variable names to their respective values and iterate over the dictionary to print out the variable names and their corresponding data types.
sample_output: age: int, height: float, name: str, is_admin: bool, colors: list
